com.facebook.buck.rules

Interface AbiRule

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidLibraryRule, DefaultJavaLibraryRule, FakeDefaultJavaLibraryRule, JavaTestRule, RobolectricTestRule

    public interface AbiRule
    BuildRule that can avoid rebuilding itself when the ABI of its deps has not changed and all properties of the rule other than its deps have not changed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<Sha1HashCode> getAbiKeyForDeps()
      Returns a Sha1HashCode that represents the ABI of this rule's deps.
      Optional<Sha1HashCode> getAbiKeyForDepsOnDisk(ProjectFilesystem projectFilesystem)
      This is the same as getAbiKeyForDeps(), but is the ABI key of this rule's deps that was computed the last time this rule was built locally, so its value is read from disk.
      Optional<RuleKey> getRuleKeyWithoutDeps()
      Normally, a RuleKey is a function of the RuleKey of each of its deps as well as that of its inputs.
      Optional<RuleKey> getRuleKeyWithoutDepsOnDisk(ProjectFilesystem projectFilesystem)
      This is the same as getRuleKeyWithoutDeps(), but is the RuleKey for the output that is currently written to disk, rather than the output that will be written once this AbiRule is built.
      boolean initializeFromDisk(ProjectFilesystem projectFilesystem)
      Instructs this rule to report the ABI it has on disk as its current ABI.

    • Method Detail

      • getRuleKeyWithoutDeps

        Optional<RuleKey> getRuleKeyWithoutDeps()
        Normally, a RuleKey is a function of the RuleKey of each of its deps as well as that of its inputs. This returns a RuleKey that is a function of only its inputs, which can be used to determine whether the definition or inputs of the rule changed independent of changes to its [transitive] deps.
        Returns:
        Optional.absent() if there is an error when computing the RuleKey

      • getRuleKeyWithoutDepsOnDisk

        Optional<RuleKey> getRuleKeyWithoutDepsOnDisk(ProjectFilesystem projectFilesystem)
        This is the same as getRuleKeyWithoutDeps(), but is the RuleKey for the output that is currently written to disk, rather than the output that will be written once this AbiRule is built. This is designed to be compared with the result of getRuleKeyWithoutDeps() as a heuristic for whether this rule needs to be rebuilt if its deps [or the ABI of its deps] have not changed.
        Returns:
        Optional.absent() if this BuildRule has not been built locally before, in which case there is no RuleKey from a previous run.

      • getAbiKeyForDeps

        Optional<Sha1HashCode> getAbiKeyForDeps()
        Returns a Sha1HashCode that represents the ABI of this rule's deps.
        Returns:
        Optional.absent() if not all deps that should have an ABI key have one.

      • getAbiKeyForDepsOnDisk

        Optional<Sha1HashCode> getAbiKeyForDepsOnDisk(ProjectFilesystem projectFilesystem)
        This is the same as getAbiKeyForDeps(), but is the ABI key of this rule's deps that was computed the last time this rule was built locally, so its value is read from disk. This is designed to be compared with the result of getAbiKeyForDeps() as a heuristic for whether this rule needs to be rebuilt.
        Returns:
        Optional.absent() if the deps of this BuildRule have not been built locally before, in which case there is no data from a previous run.

      • initializeFromDisk

        boolean initializeFromDisk(ProjectFilesystem projectFilesystem)
        Instructs this rule to report the ABI it has on disk as its current ABI.
        Returns:
        whether the ABI was read from disk and loaded into memory successfully.
